page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT AND GAMES
page.content: { GAMES. We like playing games because it is fun.Our favourite games are computer games like Watchperson where you have to go round a town without going down each street more than once.I like making dens and playing on machines in amusement arcades at the seaside. In the playground girls play hopscotch and skipping.When it is bad weather we stay indoors and play board games and cards.At Youth Club we play table tennis,darts and bar skittles. This latter game has a long pole with a chain on which is a ball.You swing the ball and knock the skittles down and score points.Adults like to play bingo or darts.They go out at nights to play snooker, badminton and squash. They meet at pubs to have a drink and a chat.
